<span class="citation" data-cites="jimp/jpeg">@jimp/jpeg</span>
===============================================================

Default Jimp jpeg encoder/decoder.

Available Methods
-----------------

### Jimp.quality

Sets the quality of the image when saving as JPEG format (default is 100)
